Whenever a creature you control dies, exile it. Then if it didn't have a +1/+1 counter on it, return it to the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.
{3}{R}{G}, Sacrifice Remain Steady: Create an X/X black Spirit creature token that can't block, where X is the total mana value of cards exiled with Remain Steady. It gains haste.
